_header: Worldly love is in heart busy thought
_description: On worldly and spiritual love — two monorhyming quatrains

BodLatLitE17.First Lines:
Wordly loue is in herte bysy þouȝtwonder fer and wyde y
                    souȝt…
BodLatLitE17.Last Lines:
…Hit fedyþ wiþ ioy mannys myndand euer hit
                    lastiþ wiþ oute end
